clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Avastin (Bevacizumab) in Combination With Neoadjuvant Treatment Regimens in Patients With Primary HER2 Negative Breast Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Randomized, ph II Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Effect of Avastin in Combination With Neoadj Treatment Regimens on the Molecular and Metabolic Characteristics and Changes in the Primary Tumors With Ref to the Obtained Responses in Patients With Large Primary HER2 Neg Breast Cancers

brief_summary.textblock: This 2 arm study will evaluate the effect of Avastin, in combination with chemotherapy or endocrine therapy, as preoperative treatment in patients with HER2 negative breast cancer. Patients will be randomized to receive either chemotherapy (FEC100 for 4 x 3weekly cycles or endocrine therapy (an aromatase inhibitor daily for 24 weeks)with or without Avastin (15mg/kg iv every 3 weeks).The anticipated time on study treatment is 3-12 months, and the target sample size is 100-500 individuals.

primary_outcome.measure: MRI determinants of pathological complete response

secondary_outcome.measure: Molecular changes in protein kinase, mRNA/miRNA and protein expression; SNP profiles predicting treatment response; treatment-induced changes in tumor cells.
